text: Mary Ellis (née Wilkins; 2 February 1937 – 24 July 2018) was a British ferry pilot. She was one of the last surviving British women pilots from the Second World War. She was born in Leafield, Oxfordshire. She fought with the Royal Air Force and the Air Transport Auxiliary. Ellis died on 24 July 2018 in Sandown, Isle of Wight, aged 81. ==References== Category:1917 births Category:2018 deaths Category:British military personnel of World War II Category:British centenarians Category:People from Oxfordshire
title: Mary Ellis
